result.eng: Does everybody here speak Irish?

result.eng: Anybody looking for a job in Raidió na Gaeltachta should speak good Irish.

result.eng: Anybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.

result.eng: The Irish-language cause was very dear to my father.

result.eng: The language they spoke was Irish and not English.

result.eng: You must speak good Irish to get a job in Raidió na Gaeltachta.
